jdbcService.sql: select h.id, h.created, h.modified, h.started, h.stopped, h.table_name, h.field_name, h.new_value, h.instance_id, h.change_type, h.context_id, case when u.alias is not null then u.alias else n.name end from node_history_values h left outer join nodes n on n.id = h.instance_id left outer join users u on n.id = u.id where h.context_id = :auditId
